Reviews.Title: “Filthy, Disgusting Dump”

Reviews.Content: reservation stay la mesa arrived 10 pm manager locked office door door immediately locked comfortable safe feeling beyond disgusting smelled bad front broken drawers dresser filthy husband walked bed bathroom socks socks black filth carpet bed horrible terrified getting bed bugs sleep reservations nights stay cancelled reservation refund stay hotel
